Manager of all Marketing realms: Brand ManagementDigital Marketing Manager (Website, Blogging, Email, Social Media, Search, Mobile, etc)Manage TV Advertising - Media Buying, Spot Production & Creative ManagerManage Radio Advertising - Media Buying & CreativeManage Newspaper Advertising - Media Buying & CreativeOutdoor Media - Media Buying & CreativeDirect Mail - Plans, Creative & PrintingPR & Event Management (Job Fairs, Expos, etc.)PR - Press Releases, Award Applications, Press Contact, etc.Reputation Management (Online & Off)Vendor Co-op buys, tracking and management Customer Database, CRM & New systemsResearch, Plan, Budget, Execution, and Reporting

Worked as Marketing Manager for both George Brazil Plumbing & Electrical, as well as George Brazil Air Conditioning & Heating - 2 companies owned and managed separately. Job goal was to increase publicity of the overall George Brazil name in Arizona, while managing both marketing budgets to make sure there was no marketing spend overlap between the two companies.

ROCKET MEDIA Marketing Plan Development, Client Life Cycle Plan, Client Satisfaction Plan and Sales Training Development, Implementation and Execution. Promotion and management of internally, custom designed, web applications and analytical services. Account sales and management, creating a strong, long lasting relationship with clients. ROCKET MEDIA website control and management  through a content management system for ROCKET MEDIA's site. Work with planning and developing internal email marketing campaigns. Direct work with ROCKET MEDIA experts in Search Engine Marketing campaigns. Collaboration work with ROCKET MEDIA designers to create client websites and promotional material. Networking events through the Gilbert Chamber of Commerce, Phoenix BBB and affiliate company ToFixIt!. Community involvement through volunteer work and distributing company donations. In addition, I run social media campaigns for ROCKET MEDIA and ROCKET MEDIA's clients. Social media services include updating, optimizing and managing clients' accounts. If a client is not able to purchase month to month services I also offer training to individuals and groups.

ROCKET Analytics is a suite of web and phone analytics that reports results of online and offline marketing campaigns. I work with marketing these services as a sister company to ROCKET MEDIA. Along with marketing and selling these services, I also use them for my own campaigns for both ROCKET MEDIA and ROCKET Analytics and the reporting depth is truly amazing! I give free demos if you are interested.

Planned weekly and monthly promotions to increase customer transactions. Worked with relevant vendors in scheduling displays in store. Assisted managers with organizing and calculating employee commissions. Increased sales through exemplary performance in customer service. Continuously competed in and won sales staff credit card incentive programs.

summary: I enjoy challenges, and I use both creative thinking and my extensive marketing experience to help create, measure and achieve company and customer goals.I am currently employed at George Brazil Air Conditioning & Heating as the Marketing Manager. As the marketing manager, I am George Brazil HVAC's biggest cheerleader when any interest is shown in our company's services, products, and employment. Specialties: Social Media Marketing, Reputation Management, Brand Management, Blog Development & Marketing, Media Buying (TV, Newspaper, Billboards, Radio, Internet), Media Production, Direct Mail Campaigns, Promotional Printing, Press Release Development & Promotion, Creative Thinking, Client Life Cycle Analysis & Development, Sales Strategy, Marketing Plans, Branding & Identity Management, Writing for the Web, Client Relationships, Web 3.0 Marketing & Strategy, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Pay-Per-Click (PPC), Remarking, Internet Campaign Tracking/Reporting, Website Analytics, Hiring Recruitment/Employment, Employees Perks Programs & Events
